settings.title: serum waters
settings.description: This one-of-a-kindwater-form serum is an ultra-lightweight and wonder working leave-on treatment that instantly absorbs without ever pilling (even under makeup). Skin healthy Serum Water contains highly concentrated energetic plant actives that deeply penetrate the lower layers of your skin and deliver incredibly transformative radiance-rich results.

bubble rinse cleansers
settings.description: This new type of water-form cleanser is lightweight, gentle, non-stripping and ultra-healthy for your skin. Bubble Rinse Cleanser will not leave your skin feeling tight or dry like conventional cleansers with harsh surfactants that remove your skin’s naturally beneficial oils. This moisture preserving formula removes NON-waterproof makeup, oil, dirt, and impurities easily. Leaves skin feelingsoft, clean and refreshed.

settings.title: toners
settings.description: Facewater toners are superhealthy antioxidant rich elixirs that effectively cleanse, balance, clarify, and purify - without ever drying your skin. Our moisture replenishing, 100% plant based toners are completely free of harmful synthetic ingredients.

settings.title: miracle pore minimizing toner $17
settings.text: delivers unbelievably smoother, more flawless skin; reduces the appearance of enlarged pores - without dimethicone or other damaging and pore-clogging occlusive agents.

settings.title: juicy skin firming serum water $20
settings.text: provides unparalleled, long lasting heavenly hydration that strengthens your moisture barrier to reveal firmer, bouncier skin

settings.title: deeply hydrating moisture water $24
settings.text: a creamy, fast-absorbing formula that hydrates from within, acting as a moisture magnet that visibly plumps your skin

settings.title: oilwaters
settings.description: This innovative, weightless advancement of conventional facial oil melts right into your skin - without ever feeling greasy or tacky. Pore healthy Oilwater rapidly absorbs upon contact for sumptuously soft skin and long-lasting luminous glow– a super healthy addition to any skincare routine.
